sentences.en: Before the day was over, Henry issued a cryptic memo to top executives.
sentences.cn: 亨利赶着在当天就向高级职员发出了一份使人费解的内部通知.

sentences.en: But how effective really is a daily dose of cryptic crossword?
sentences.cn: 不过一天一张字谜游戏是有多大的效果 呢 ?

sentences.en: But the abrupt and cryptic nature of the ending has puzzled and annoyed many readers.
sentences.cn: 结局的出其不意和神秘性竟使许多读者困惑和烦恼.

sentences.en: But to save space , it does so in a fairly cryptic fashion.
sentences.cn: 但是,为了节省空间, 这是以一种很隐秘的方式实现的.

sentences.en: Dry Valley upturned rock showing cryptic microbes.
sentences.cn: 麦克默多乾谷的石头隐藏着微生物.

sentences.en: He has issued a short, cryptic statement denying the spying charges.
sentences.cn: 他发表了一个简短、令人捉摸不透的声明，否认对他从事间谍活动的指控。

sentences.en: He pointed north with a cryptic laugh. " Over there, Beijing. "
sentences.cn: 老汉神秘地一笑,指着正北的方向说: “ 喏,从那里, 北京. ”

sentences.en: Hidden Weapon is the most cryptic stunt in Chinese Kungfu.
sentences.cn: 暗器在中国武术中要算是最神秘的绝技.

sentences.en: I don't know what this cryptic remark is intended to convey.
sentences.cn: 我不知道这句暗藏玄机的评语是要表示什麽.

sentences.en: It was the cryptic first sign of a cyberespionage and information-warfare campaign devised to disrupt the 2016 presidential election, the first such attempt by a foreign power in American history.
sentences.cn: 这是一场网络间谍—信息战行动的第一个神秘迹象，该行动旨在干扰2016年的总统大选，在美国的历史上，这还是第一次有外国势力有这样的举动。

sentences.en: Not clear - I can't understand the problem because the message is too vague or cryptic.
sentences.cn: 不明确 —— 消息含义太隐晦,无法理解.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the correlation between bacterial cryptic growth cell ( CGC ) and irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨肠道细菌潜生体(crypticgrowthcell,CGC ) 与肠易激综合征 ( IBS ) 的关系.

sentences.en: She made a cryptic comment about how the film mirrored her life.
sentences.cn: 她隐晦地表示说这部电影是她人生的写照.

sentences.en: So you thought sending cryptic e - mails was going to help us find his killer?
sentences.cn: 你认为给我们发送加密的 电子邮件 会帮我们找到凶手?

sentences.en: This cryptic saying produced silence, until he spoke again.
sentences.cn: 这些隐秘的吐露使得大家全都沉默下来, 后来还是他开了口.

sentences.en: This thrilling story will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the house, collect items and unravel cryptic secrets.
sentences.cn: 这惊心动魄的故事，将让你在你的座位边，为您探索的房子，收集物品和解开神秘的秘密。

sentences.en: Your application avoids cryptic file names that are visible to users.
sentences.cn: 你的应用程序不会用意义含糊的名字的命名用户可见的文件.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的，含义模糊的；[动]隐藏的

trans.tran_cn: 神秘的，隐藏的，有隐含意义的，使用密码的
trans.tran_en: having a meaning that is mysterious or not easily understood
